About

I’m Marcelo Borges, a technology leader focused on Data, AI, and modern cloud architectures across Latin America. My passion is helping companies unlock the full potential of their data through real-world applications of:

  • Distributed cloud databases
  • GenAI and agentic frameworks
  • High-scale transactional and analytical workloads
  • Practical, customer-driven design

I bridge the technical and the business worlds — working with engineering teams, architects, C-level stakeholders, and partners to design systems that are resilient, scalable, and AI-ready.

My work spans the entire lifecycle of enterprise adoption: evaluation, PoCs, migration, architecture design, renewals, and long-term expansion. I enjoy creating clarity, communicating simply, and building trusted relationships.

My Focus

  • Modern Data Platforms
    Apache Cassandra, NoSQL, serverless databases, hybrid + multi-cloud patterns.

  • AI & GenAI Enablement
    Vector search, embeddings, Langflow, agent ecosystems, watsonx integration.

  • Go-to-Market & Customer Success
    Helping LATAM enterprises navigate technical and commercial transformation.
